Name: Add-KSScheduledRestart
Description: Add a scheduled restart to the schedule file.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Start-KSScheduledRestart
Description: Start a scheduled restart process of the computers specified in a schedule file.

Name: Update-KSScheduledRestart
Description: Update the NextRestart value of a specific scheduled restart entry.
Author: Chris Dent
